name: Guidance: A Maze Runner
description:
Game Description

The game is a speech guided maze where you dictate your movement.

The Game requires a microphone.

Repository Link

btkgamedesign / gameaweek_sshrestha_gift — Bitbucket

Release Notes

Version 0.1

Johan Brodd: A Winter Tale (A winter tale | OpenGameArt.org)

Based on Speech Recognition in Unity By Lightbuzz

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 20)
